trends: There has been one other sighting in Royston
There were no other sightings in Royston on or around May 30th 2009
Summary: In the daytime about 4 P.M. at first looked like the big dipper (stars).
divs: Sighting DetailsIt Was like in the Day time when you see the Moon in the middle of the day but this looked like the big dipper stars. at first i thougth i have never seen stars in the day light how neat but looked closer and the stars started moving to each other and in different formations and started moving away slowly. i also saw planes flying but looked much closer and moved let a plane with fog tail but the star looking things had no tail just let a star. it was different than i have aver seen before maybe satellites? it was neat to see and just want to report if at all anything at all? Thanks Phil Grimes 1 (706) 283-4052. i have no pictures all i have is a camera cell phone and this would not have worked i would need a good lens camera to get good photo.
